product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 6 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 6 Tent lets you and up to 5 of your friends experience the joys of summer camping in dry, spacious comfort. Shockcorded 11mm fiberglass poles provide sturdy support. Nylon taffeta body and rainfly are light and durable. Uncoated walls let the tent breathe under the urethane-coated fly to help reduce condensation. Rainfly is full length on the sides; center rainfly pole creates an awning over each door for excellent rain protection. Factory-sealed floor and rainfly seams help ensure you stay dry inside tent. 2 doors help eliminate the need to crawl over others to get in and out. Second door also creates cross ventilation in hot, muggy weather. Mesh storage pockets and gear loft keep small items organized and off the floor. The ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 6 Tent comes with stakes and guylines. Special buy.
short_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 6 Tent lets you and up to 5 of your friends experience the joys of summer camping in dry, spacious comfort.
